title: 8/24/21: Vaccine Mandates, Australia Dystopia, Corporate Democrats, Andrew Cuomo Exits, Afghanistan Evacuations, DeSantis Derangement, Healthcare Dysfunction, California Recall, and More!

itunes:subtitle: Krystal and Saagar talk about the Biden admin's pressure for vaccine mandates, Australia's covid dystopia, corporate Democrats fighting Bernie, Andrew Cuomo's lies on his way out, Afghanistan evacuations, media smears of Ron DeSantis, Healthcare corruption, California recall election, and more!
